text: Puessans is a commune in the Doubs department. It is in the Bourgogne-Franche- Comt√© region in eastern France. ==Geography== Puessans is south of Rougemont. It is at the bottom of a hill in the Val-Mont-Martin. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Puessans on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
